short_summary: Providing herbicides to control water soldier in Trent- Severn waterway
description: The herbicide must be legally registered in Canada for both the use on Water Soldier and for application in/ on bodies of water.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: 5P315-230048 Herbicide
**Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)

**Reference Number**: WS4169817117-Doc4209703508

**Amendment Number**: 1

**Solicitation Number**: WS4169817117

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-10, 14:00:00 EDT
* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-13
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-01
* **Contract End Date**: N/A

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to provide herbicides for the control of Water Soldier (Stratiotes aloides) in the Trent-Severn Waterway. The herbicides must be legally registered in Canada for application in/on bodies of water and for the targeted plant species.

### Procurement Method

*   **Notice Type**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
*   **Selection Criteria**: The offer with the lowest price will be selected.

### Trade Agreements

The tender is open to offerors who are Parties to:
**Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
**World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)**
**Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)**
**Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**
**Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**
**Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
**Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)**
**Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
**Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)**
**Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
**Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
**Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)**
**North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)**

### Contact Information
*   **Contact Person**: Fraser, Alexa (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: [alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Contact URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17440957?extsite=MTc0NDA5NTdfQU4
